common.WRONG_SEED: Wrong seed phrase. Please try again.
common.WRONG_PRIVATE_KEY: Wrong private key. Please try again.
common.SEND_DESCRIPTION: Sending on Ethereum only available when using wallet inside the Morpher app.

auth.CANNOT_DECRYPT_PASSWORD: The Password you provided can't be used to de-crypt your wallet.
auth.RESTORE_ACCOUNT: Do you want to restore your Account?

delete.DELETE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Verify your wallet keys before deleting your account.
delete.SEED_TIP: Make sure to have one space between each word.
delete.PLEASE_EXPORT_YOUR_WALLET: Please <router-link to='{link}' class='login-router transition-faster'>export your wallet</router-link> first.
delete.DELETE_TIP: You need to verify ownership with the seed phrase or private key before your account can be removed.
delete.WHAT_DELETE_DESCRIPTION: Any information in our databases linked to this wallet account (such as email and settings).
delete.DOES_DELETE_WALLET_DESCRIPTION: We don’t control your wallet. As long as you have your keys, you can use your wallet with any other Ethereum service. For example you can import your keys into Metamask.
delete.WHAT_FUNDS_DESCRIPTION: Funds on mainnet Ethereum are not affected by account deletion.

recovery.RECOVERY_DESCRIPTION: Forgot your password? Login with your recovery account to unlock your wallet.
recovery.ENTER_EMAIL: Please enter your email to start recovery.
recovery.ADD_TRUSTED_ACCOUNT: Add a trusted online account as the recovery method for your wallet (in case you forget your wallet password).
recovery.ADD_ACCOUNT_TIP_DESCRIPTION: Your wallet keys are never shared. These services cannot access your wallet or monitor your funds & activity. Please make sure to use a recovery account with a strong password.
recovery.ACCOUNT_AT_RISK: Your account is at risk, losing your password means losing all your funds. We recommend adding a trusted recovery account.

2fa.2FA_EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: Get a code sent to your email address every time you log in.
2fa.2FA_AUTH_DESCRIPTION: Use an authenticator app to generate a code for logging in.
2fa.VERIFICATION_LOSE: If you lose your 2-step verification device, trusted account recovery will not work.
2fa.EMAIL_CONFIRMATION_DESCRIPTION: We sent you an email with code. Enter the verification code below to confirm 2-step activation.
2fa.NEED_AUTHENTICATOR_HELP: Need an authenticator? Get Authy or Google Authenticator.
2fa.CHANGE_AUTH_DESCRIPTION: Scan the QR code with an authenticator app. Enter the verification code below to confirm 2-step activation.
2fa.ENTER_EMAIL_CODE: Please enter the code we sent to your email.
2fa.ENTER_AUTH_CODE: Please enter the code from your authenticator app.
2fa.ENTER_BOTH_CODES: Please input both code we sent you over the email and two FA Authenticator code.
2fa.2_STEP_ADDED: All done, 2-step verification has been added to your account. Your account is now more secure!
2fa.2_STEP_REMOVED: 2-step verification has been removed from your account.
2fa.2_STEP_REMOVED_WARNING: Your account security is much lower now.
2fa.KYC_DESCRIPTION: Please complete KYC in the Morpher app if you want to be able to restore your account. If you lose 2FA access and we cannot verify your identity, your wallet will be lost.
2fa.PLEASE_ADD_2_STEP: Please add 2-step verification to increase wallet security.
2fa.2_STEP_RECOMMENDATION_DESCRIPTION: Complete KYC on Morpher to avoid losing wallet after losing 2FA device.

password.RESET_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Account recovered successfully! Please reset your password below.

export.EXPORT_WALLET_DESCRIPTION: For advanced users only! Export wallet seed phrase & private key for backup or to change wallets.
export.EXPORT_SEED_DESCRIPTION: Save your seed phrase in a safe place (never share it).
export.EXPORT_KEY_DESCRIPTION: Save your private key in a safe place (never share it).
export.KEY_PASSWORD_PROTECTED: The private key JSON file is password protected using your wallet password.

confirm.CONFIRM_ACCESS_DESCRIPTION: Please enter your password before making changes.

errors.WRONG_PASSWORD: The password you entered is not correct.
errors.SAME_EMAIL: The Email Address you entered is the same as you already use.
errors.NETWORK_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: A network error occured. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.USER_NOT_FOUND: No account found. Please check your credentials and try again.
errors.RECOVERY_METHOD_NOT_EXIST: The Recovery Method does not exist.
errors.USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: Wallet for this mail already exists.
errors.ACCOUNT_NOT_CONFIRMED: Account not yet confirmed. Try again.
errors.SOME_2FA_WRONG: Either Email2FA or Authenticator2FA was wrong. Try again.
errors.EMAIL_2FA_WRONG: Incorrect Email 2FA code. Check your email and Try again.
errors.EMAIL_2FA_EXPIRED: Email 2FA is expired. Logout/Login and enter Email 2FA within 15 minutes.
errors.PROBLEM_SENDING_EMAIL: There was a problem parsing the email
errors.CANNOT_VERIFY_EMAIL_CODE: Could not verify email code. Please try again.
errors.DECRYPT_FAILED: Password provided failed to decrypt your account.
errors.GOOGLE_COOKIES_BLOCKED: Unable to log into Google. It looks like cookies are disabled wich may be blocking google access. Try turning off incognito mode.
errors.GOOGLE_SCRIPT_BLOCKED: Unable to log into Google. The google login script has been blocked, possibly by an ad-blocker. Try turning off your ad-blocker and login again.
errors.RECOVERY_UNLOCK_ERROR: Unable to unlock your wallet. This may be because you used a different account or never set up account recovery.
errors.FALLBACK_MESSAGE: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
